text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires a concrete breakdown of registration tax for the *compromesso* (e.g., 200\u20ac, 0.5%, 3%, etc.). The candidate answer discusses registration taxes in the context of the final deed (*rogito*) (2% or 9% of cadastral value, or VAT), but it fails to provide the specific registration tax breakdown applicable to the *compromesso* itself, which is typically a fixed fee plus a percentage (0.5% up to a cap) if it is registered.", "criterion_id": "40c39cdb-4a31-4cdb-84b7-89f2ebc16228"}
